mapper.sql: DMN_ID, DMN_LNM, DMN_PNM, DMNG_ID, INFOTP_ID, UPP_DMN_ID, SUBJ_ID, LST_ENTY_ID, LST_ENTY_PNM, LST_ENTY_LNM, CD_VAL_TYP_CD, CD_VAL_IVW_CD, SDITM_AUTO_CRT_YN, DATA_FRM, CRG_USER_ID, DMN_ORG_DS, RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, LNM_CRI_DS,ENC_YN,DMN_DSCD,DATA_TYPE,DATA_LEN,DATA_SCAL ,SAVE_FRM,EXPRSN_FRM,UNIT,CD_VAL,ADMN_STND_CD, OWNR_ORG, SPCL_NT
mapper.select:
SELECT A.* FROM WAM_DMN A
WHERE A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ORDER BY A.RQST_DTM DESC limit 30
SELECT COUNT(INFOTP_LNM) FROM WAM_DMN WHERE 1 = 1 AND ORG_NM = #{orgNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND INFOTP_LNM = #{infotpLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND CONFIRM_YN = 'Y'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WAM_DMN A WHERE 1 = 1
AND ORG_NM IN (SELECT ORG_NM FROM WAA_ORG WHERE ORG_CD IN (SELECT ORG_CD FROM WAA_USER_ORG WHERE USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}))
AND VALID_YN = 'E'
AND VALID_YN = 'Y'
AND (VALID_YN IS NULL OR VALID_YN = '' OR VALID_YN = 'N')
AND CONFIRM_YN = 'Y'
AND A.DMN_ID = #{dmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND ORG_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orgNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (DMN_LNM LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%') OR DMN_PNM LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%') OR DMN_LNM LIKE CONCAT('%' , UPPER(#{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) , '%') OR DMN_PNM LIKE CONCAT('%' , UPPER(#{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) , '%') OR INFOTP_LNM LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%') OR INFOTP_LNM LIKE CONCAT('%' , UPPER(#{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) , '%') OR DMNG_LNM LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%') OR DMNG_LNM LIKE CONCAT('%' , UPPER(#{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) , '%') )

SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.* , CASE WHEN A.ERR_CHK IS NOT NULL and A.ERR_CHK != '' THEN '#FF0000' ELSE NULL END AS FontColor FROM WAM_DMN A WHERE 1 = 1
AND ORG_NM IN (SELECT ORG_NM FROM WAA_ORG WHERE ORG_CD IN (SELECT ORG_CD FROM WAA_USER_ORG WHERE USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}))
AND VALID_YN = 'E'
AND VALID_YN = 'Y'
AND (VALID_YN IS NULL OR VALID_YN = '' OR VALID_YN = 'N')
AND CONFIRM_YN = 'Y'
AND A.DMN_ID = #{dmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND ORG_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orgNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (DMN_LNM LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%') OR DMN_PNM LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%') OR DMN_LNM LIKE CONCAT('%' , UPPER(#{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) , '%') OR DMN_PNM LIKE CONCAT('%' , UPPER(#{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) , '%') OR INFOTP_LNM LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%') OR INFOTP_LNM LIKE CONCAT('%' , UPPER(#{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) , '%') OR DMNG_LNM LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%') OR DMNG_LNM LIKE CONCAT('%' , UPPER(#{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) , '%') )
AND ROWNUM BETWEEN #{startNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND #{endNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) FSQ ORDER BY DMN_LNM
mapper.insert: insert into WAM_DMN (DMN_ID, DMN_LNM, DMN_PNM, DMNG_ID, INFOTP_ID, UPP_DMN_ID, SUBJ_ID, LST_ENTY_ID, LST_ENTY_PNM, LST_ENTY_LNM, CD_VAL_TYP_CD, CD_VAL_IVW_CD, SDITM_AUTO_CRT_YN, DATA_FRM, CRG_USER_ID, DMN_ORG_DS, RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID,ENC_YN,DMN_DSCD, OWNR_ORG, SPCL_NT ) values (#{dmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dmnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dmnPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dmngId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{infotpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uppDmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lstEntyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lstEntyPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lstEntyLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cdValTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cdValIvwCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sditmAutoCrtYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataFrm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crgUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dmnOrgDs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=DATE}, #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=DATE}, #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=DATE}, #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{encYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dmnDscd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownrOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spclNt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update WAM_DMN
DMN_LNM = #{dmnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DMN_PNM = #{dmnPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DMNG_ID = #{dmngId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INFOTP_ID = #{infotpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPP_DMN_ID = #{uppDmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUBJ_ID = #{subjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LST_ENTY_ID = #{lstEntyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LST_ENTY_PNM = #{lstEntyPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LST_ENTY_LNM = #{lstEntyLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CD_VAL_TYP_CD = #{cdValTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CD_VAL_IVW_CD = #{cdValIvwCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SDITM_AUTO_CRT_YN = #{sditmAutoCrtYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATA_FRM = #{dataFrm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CRG_USER_ID = #{crgUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DMN_ORG_DS = #{dmnOrgDs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=DATE},
FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=DATE},
RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=DATE},
APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENC_YN = #{encYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DMN_DSCD = #{dmnDscd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SAVE_FRM = #{saveFrm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXPRSN_FRM = #{exprsnFrm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CD_VAL = #{cdVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADMN_STND_CD = #{admnStndCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DMNG_LNM = #{dmngLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INFOTP_LNM = #{infotpLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATA_TYPE = UPPER(#{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),
DATA_LEN = #{dataLen,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DATA_SCAL = #{dataScal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORG_NM = #{orgNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OWNR_ORG = #{ownrOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SPCL_NT = #{spclNt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ERR_CHK = #{errChk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where DMN_ID = #{dmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update WAM_DMN set DMN_LNM = #{dmnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DMN_PNM = #{dmnPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DMNG_ID = #{dmngId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INFOTP_ID = #{infotpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPP_DMN_ID = #{uppDmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUBJ_ID = #{subjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LST_ENTY_ID = #{lstEntyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LST_ENTY_PNM = #{lstEntyPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LST_ENTY_LNM = #{lstEntyLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CD_VAL_TYP_CD = #{cdValTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CD_VAL_IVW_CD = #{cdValIvwCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SDITM_AUTO_CRT_YN = #{sditmAutoCrtYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATA_FRM = #{dataFrm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CRG_USER_ID = #{crgUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DMN_ORG_DS = #{dmnOrgDs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=DATE}, FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=DATE}, RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=DATE}, APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , ENC_YN = #{encYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,DMN_DSCD = #{dmnDscd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,DATA_TYPE = UPPER(#{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) ,DATA_LEN = #{dataLen,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,DATA_SCAL = #{dataScal,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,ORG_NM = #{orgNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , OWNR_ORG = #{ownrOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , SPCL_NT = #{spclNt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where DMN_ID = #{dmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into WAM_DMN () select
from WAH_DMN where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT( '99991231', '%Y%m%d') and REG_TYP_CD in ('C','U')
mapper.select: SELECT A.* , GET_USER_NM(A.RQST_USER_ID) AS RQST_USER_NM , CASE WHEN A.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT( '9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') THEN '#0000FF' ELSE NULL END AS FontColor FROM WAH_DMN A WHERE A.DMN_ID = #{dmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY A.EXP_DTM DESC, A.STR_DTM DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE WAH_DMN SET TRANS_YN = CASE WHEN #{transYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} = '1' THEN 'Y' WHEN #{transYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} = '0' THEN 'N' END WHERE DMN_ID = #{dmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT( '99991231', '%Y%m%d') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
UPDATE WAH_SDITM SET TRANS_YN = 'Y' WHERE DMN_ID = #{dmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT( '99991231', '%Y%m%d') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
mapper.insert:
insert into WAM_DMN ( DMN_ID, DMN_LNM, DMN_PNM, DMNG_ID, INFOTP_ID, UPP_DMN_ID, SUBJ_ID, LST_ENTY_ID, LST_ENTY_PNM, LST_ENTY_LNM, CD_VAL_TYP_CD, CD_VAL_IVW_CD, SDITM_AUTO_CRT_YN, DATA_FRM, CRG_USER_ID, DMN_ORG_DS, RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, ENC_YN, DMN_DSCD, SAVE_FRM, EXPRSN_FRM, UNIT, CD_VAL, ADMN_STND_CD, DMNG_LNM, INFOTP_LNM, DATA_TYPE, DATA_LEN, DATA_SCAL, ORG_NM, OWNR_ORG, SPCL_NT, ERR_CHK, VALID_YN, CONFIRM_YN ) values
( concat('I_', db_serial.next_value), #{item.dmnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dmnPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dmngId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.infotpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.uppDmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.subjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.lstEntyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.lstEntyPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.lstEntyLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cdValTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cdValIvwCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sditmAutoCrtYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dataFrm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.crgUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dmnOrgDs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, 'C', #{item.frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.rqstDtm,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.aprvDtm,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.encYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dmnDscd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.saveFrm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.exprsnFrm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cdVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.admnStndCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dmngLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.infotpLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPPER(#{item.dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), #{item.dataLen,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.dataScal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.orgNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.ownrOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.spclNt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.errChk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.validYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.confirmYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

update.foreach: update WAM_DMN set CONFIRM_DTM = sys_datetime, CONFIRM_YN = 'Y' where DMN_ID = #{item.dmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DMN_ID, ORG_NM, INFOTP_LNM, DATA_TYPE, DATA_LEN, TO_CHAR (RQST_DTM,'YYYYMMDD') AS DMN_DTM FROM WAM_DMN WHERE (CONFIRM_YN = 'N' OR CONFIRM_YN = '' OR CONFIRM_YN IS NULL) AND (VALID_YN = 'N' OR VALID_YN = '' OR VALID_YN IS NULL) ORDER BY DMN_ID ASC ) T1 where ROWNUM <= 1000
